text: Leah ga hai dama ga haanau mai dana dama daane. Gei mee ga helekai, “Dimaadua gu iloo Ia dogu haingadaa, dolomeenei gei dogu lodo ga aloho i di au.” Gei mee gaa gahi di ingoo o dana dama bolo “Reuben”.29.32 Reuben: di ingoo deenei le e hai dono lee be telekai Hebrew boloo, “Gu iloo ia dogu haingadaa”
